mapper.sql: id, user_id, jm_type, inc_value, before_inc_value, obj_id, del_flag, jm_desc, remarks, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date
mapper.select: SELECT user_id,(SELECT userinfo.nickname FROM t_user_info userinfo WHERE userinfo.id = jiumlog.user_id) as nike_name , (SELECT userinfo.picurl FROM t_user_info userinfo WHERE userinfo.id = jiumlog.user_id) as picurl, SUM(jiumlog.inc_value) AS jiu_sum FROM t_jiumi_log jiumlog WHERE jiumlog.create_date BETWEEN #{startDate} and NOW() GROUP BY jiumlog.user_id LIMIT 100

SELECT (SELECT userinfo.nickname FROM t_user_info userinfo WHERE userinfo.id = jiumlog.user_id) as nike_name , (SELECT userinfo.picurl FROM t_user_info userinfo WHERE userinfo.id = jiumlog.user_id) as picurl, SUM(jiumlog.inc_value) AS jiu_sum FROM t_jiumi_log jiumlog WHERE jiumlog.user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and jiumlog.create_date BETWEEN #{startDate} and NOW()
SELECT nickname as nike_name,picurl, integral as jiu_sum FROM t_user_info ORDER BY integral desc LIMIT 100
SELECT nickname as nike_name,picurl, integral as jiu_sum FROM t_user_info WHERE id=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into t_jiumi_log (id, user_id, jm_type, inc_value, before_inc_value, obj_id, del_flag, jm_desc, remarks, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jmType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{incValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{beforeIncValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{objId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{jmDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update t_jiumi_log
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jm_type = #{jmType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
inc_value = #{incValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
before_inc_value = #{beforeIncValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
obj_id = #{objId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
jm_desc = #{jmDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_jiumi_log set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jm_type = #{jmType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, inc_value = #{incValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, before_inc_value = #{beforeIncValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, obj_id = #{objId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, jm_desc = #{jmDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
